text: {| |} CH-6 was a of the Imperial Japanese Navy during World War II. ==History== She participated in the invasion of the Northern Philippines (Operation "M") in December 1941 where she was assigned to Sub Chaser Division 21 (SCD 21) led by Commodore Ota along with , , , , and . SCD 21 was at the time assigned to Rear Admiral Hirose Sueto's 2nd Base Force under Vice Admiral Ibō Takahashi's Third Fleet. ==References== ==Additional references== * * * Category:1938 ships Category:No.4-class submarine chasers
title: Japanese submarine chaser CH-6
